Interface Mud.RemoteMudServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    Enclosing class:
    Mud

    public static interface Mud.RemoteMudServer
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This interface defines the exported methods of the MUD server object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dump(java.lang.String password, java.lang.String filename)
      Dump the state of the server to a file so that it can be restored later All places, and their exits and things are dumped, but the "people" in them are not.
      Mud.RemoteMudPlace getEntrance()
      Return the main entrance place for this MUD
      java.lang.String getMudName()
      Return the name of this MUD
      Mud.RemoteMudPlace getNamedPlace(java.lang.String name)
      Look up and return some other named place in this MUD
